entry.title: Vileda Professional - PVAmicro 38 x 35cm Microfiber Cloth Yellow - 5/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vileda Professional
Type: Disposables
Price: 18.99

Vileda Professional - PVAmicro 38 x 35cm Microfiber Cloth - 5/Pack

Streak free, clean and fast.

Unique combined materials technology.

PVAmicro is an innovative all-purpose cloth made from microfibre fabric impregnated with PVA. The PVA treatment makes the cloth´s inner structure smooth, revealing superior cleaning performance.
PVA is well-known in professional cleaning and is used for synthetic chamois, which is appreciated for streak free cleaning and absorbency.

PVAmicro

By combining knitted microfibre with PVA (polyvinyl alcohol), the PVAmicro cloth offers attractive benefits:

Cleaning performance.

The knitted microfibre ensures perfect results on almost all surfaces.

Streak-free wiping.

The PVA has very good water absorbency, meaning streak-free wiping without after-drying.

Durability. 

PVAmicro can be washed several hundred cycles.

Easy to rinse.  

PVAmicro holds 40 times less particle residue after rinsing, compared to ordinary knitted microfibre cloth.

Coverage performance.

PVAmicro leaves a very fine film on the wiped surface - homogenously over an area of more than 25 m² if needed.

Usage areas.
The cloth is ideal for cleaning all types of hard surfaces, such as offices furniture, glass, stainless steel and many more. PVAmicro is ideal for bucket method in damp condition.

PVAmicro is exclusively produced by Vileda Professional (patent pending).

 

Description Color Size (cm) Art.no Case Packs/case Art.no. Pack Pieces/pack
PVAmicro blue 38x 35 cm / 15 x14 in 143585 20 143590 5
PVAmicro red 38x 35 cm / 15 x14 in 143586 20 143591 5
PVAmicro yellow 38x 35 cm / 15 x14 in 143587 20 143592 5
PVAmicro green 38x 35 cm / 15 x14 in 143588 20 143593 5

entry.title: Vileda Professional - PURmicro 38 x 35cm Microfiber Cloth Green - 5/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vileda Professional
Type: Disposables
Price: 19.99

PURmicro All purpose microfiber cloth for superior shiny results.

PURmicro is a new generation of microfibre cloth which leaves nothing behind but clean, shiny surfaces. The cloth is especially effective on surfaces such as glass and stainless
steel, where perfect cleaning result is desired. It's easy rinseability makes it suitable for use with the bucket method for all purpose cleaning in sites like offices, public buildings, hotels and many more.

PURmicro the best of two worlds

PURmicro is a combination of a knitted, textile microfibre cloth with an additional PUR (polyurethane) layer which increases the rinsability and overall cleaning result. Conventional knitted microfibre cleaning cloths are good in capturing dirt particles but can be ineffective in releasing this dirt during rinsing in the bucket. The additional PUR layer in PURmicro only partially covers the microfibre, helping to release trapped dirt during rinsing whilst maintaining the well known microfibre cleaning performance.
Only a bucket with cleaning solution is needed to achieve a super effective rinsing result. Hardly any particles are left in the cloth, that means also reducing the risk of scratching surfaces. Using PURmicro in your site can be a major contributor in maintaining the value of the building and its interiors.


PURmicro advantages


•Microfibre cleaning performance: PURmicro is made from state of the art microfibres, ensuring perfect cleaning results

•Easy to rinse: After rinsing, PURmicro holds 40 times less particles in the cloth vs. knitted microfibre cloths.

•Streak free cleaning result: Less streaks, as PURmicro releases 50% less water on

surfaces than knitted microfibre cloths

•Life cycle costs: PURmicro is long lasting, laboratory tests found it was still usable after several hundred laundering cycles

•Professional appearance: Different from knitted microfibre cloths, the PURmicro looks unstained even after a couple of weeks in use

Description Color Size Art.no Case Packs/case Art.no. Pack Pieces/pack
PURmicro blue 38x 35 cm / 15 x14 in 141690 20 141691 5
PURmicro yellow 38x 35 cm / 15 x14 in 141694 20 141695 5
PURmicro green 38x 35 cm / 15 x14 in 141696 20 141697 5

entry.title: MC - 16"x 16" Microfiber Cloth Yellow - 25 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 20.99

Microfiber Cloth Details

Clean surfaces quicker, easier, and faster with this microfiber towel. Removing 400% more dirt than cotton and absorbing nearly 7 times its own weight in liquids, this quality cloth provides efficient cleaning. Thousands of polyester / polyamide blend microscopic fibers pick up and hold dusty dirt, grime and bacteria. This hypoallergenic, lint-free, nonabrasive microfiber cloth eliminates streaking and reduces cleaning chemicals usage. This microfiber cloth is also non-abrasive, so there's no need to worry about scratching your surfaces.

Machine washable, this Terry cloth can withstand more than 500 launderings, saving you time and money buying new rags or cloths. Furthermore, this towel is available in multiple colors, enabling you to color code your towels and prevent cross contamination.

Economy Foodservice Towels, 1/4 fold, 200 Count


Economical Cascades PRO Tuff-Job® foodservice towels are durable, absorbent and reusable, ideal for general cleaning for the front and back of the house

Absorbent and reusable, Tuff-Job® foodservice towels are designed for light-duty cleaning applications to wipe up spills, food particles on tables, counters and serving areas. These towels are easy to rinse clean and dry fast ensuring a long-lasting product. This pink and white colored towel assists in masking stains for a cleaner appearance.

entry.title: Vileda - 120130 Breazy Semi Disposable Microfiber Cloth Yellow- 25/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vileda Professional
Type: Disposables
Price: 20.99

Breazy!

Image
Using Breazy is a proof of professionalism and guaranteeing the best-in-class results.

Low infrastructure requirements
Breazy does not require washing. If there are no washing facilities around, just dispose of Breazy whenever necessary and start using a new one.
You can either dispose of the cloth after a day’s use or wash it and use it again up to 15 times. 

Hygiene & Safety
With the colour coding system, a cleaning process according to hygiene standards and HACCP principles can be applied.

Material 

The unique wave structure is a patented Freudenberg technology and the waves create pockets, which capture 40% more particle dirt than a comparable conventional cloth.
The fibre blend contains microfibre, which means easy and effective cleaning.
Material:  60% Viscose,  20% Polyester,  15% Polypropylene,  5% Polyester microfibre.

Usage 
Breazy performs very well with both the bucket and spray cleaning methods. It can be used on all water-resistant surfaces such as desktops, cupboards, chairs, counters, bars, etc. Breazy is also highly suitable for all washroom surfaces.

Description Color Size (cm) Art.no Case Packs/case Art.no. Pack Pieces/pack
Breazy blue 35.5x 35cm / 14x 13.75 in 161616 12 161610 25
Breazy red 35.5x 35cm / 14x 13.75 in 161617 12 161611 25

entry.title: Cascades Pro Tuff -12"x 21" Antimicrobial Foodservice Towels W922 -150/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cascades Pro
Type: Disposables
Price: 27.99

Antimicrobial Foodservice Towels, 1/4 fold, 150 Count

Cascades PRO Tuff-Job® antimicrobial foodservice towels are engineered to inhibit the growth of odor causing bacteria and mold for the life of the towel making it a reusable product in professional kitchens and beyond.

These economical, durable and machine washable foodservice towels are both absorbent and reusable and ideal for the professional kitchen. Designed to provide superior cleaning performance whether used dry or with harsh sanitizers or disinfecting solutions, these towels are easy to rinse clean and fast drying ensuring a long-lasting product. This blue colored towel assists in masking stains for a cleaner appearance and a seamless replacement for linen rental or cloth dish towels. Made with a protectant antimicrobial agent, which inhibits the growth of odor causing bacteria and mold for the life of the towel.
